description: Number of permutations of n elements containing a 2-cycle.
comments: a(n)/n! is asymptotic to 1-e^(-1/2) = 1 - A092605. - _Michel Marcus_, Aug 08 2013
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..449
formula: E.g.f.: (1 - exp(-x^2/2)) / (1-x).n! * { 1 - sum[ k=0..floor(n/2) ] (-1)^k / (2^k * k!) }.a(n) + A000266(n) = n!. - Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 09 2003
prog: (PARI)a(n) = n! * (1 - sum(k=0,floor(n/2), (-1)^k / (2^k * k!) ) );/* _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 20 2012 */(PARI)N=33; x='x+O('x^N);v=Vec( 'a0 + serlaplace( (1-exp(-x^2/2))/(1-x) ) );v[1]-='a0;  v/* _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 20 2012 */
